exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "expo N p * fact N * Π n0 (fun i : nat => i + (N * p + 1)) * Π N (fun i : nat => Π (p - 1) (fun i0 : nat => i0 + (i * p + 1)))" in the current goal.
